articles.author: Lisa Richwine
articles.title: Shannen Doherty, '90210' and 'Charmed' actress, dies at 53 - Reuters
articles.description: American actor Shannen Doherty, best known for her role as high school student Brenda Walsh on hit 1990s television drama "Beverly Hills, 90210," has died at age 53 following a years-long battle with cancer.

articles.title: Video: Heartbroken Lionel Messi Inconsolable As Injury Forces Him Out Of Copa America Final - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Argentina captain Lionel Messi failed to control his tears after he picked up an injury during the Copa America 2024 final against Colombia

articles.title: NASA ALERT: Gigantic Asteroid To Pass Near Earth At Speed Of 73,000 KMPH - Will It Hit Our Planet? - India.com
articles.description: American space agency NASA has issued a warning regarding a gigantic asteroid - 2024 NF – which is currently on its path to pass earth at a staggering speed of 73,054 kilometres per hour.
articles.content:
